divs: Sighting DetailsHiking on Mount Tamalpias, 2pm PT, noticed circular rainbow around the sun. Took three photos and a white orb with blue purple halo appeared in each photo, in different positions.
Summary: rainbow around sun + white orb seen over mt tamalpias
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in mill valley
There were no other sightings in mill valley on or around June 18th 2013
